name: Dark Castle
overview: Bob is ordinary country boy. He working on farm everyday and he working without cease. One day, he thought that he is fed to the teeth! Bob has made a decision to digressed from his work days. But how to do that? Suddenly it dawned on him! He recalled a old castle nearby farm. Castle is very interesting place, because some say that castle immersed in witchcraft. Others say that ghosts live in castle. There is an opinion that man can stay in castle forever. Candles burning in old castle every night. It is a fact. Bob takes a matchbox by nightfall, he going to find share of adrenaline
